A torturer wearing a Jew's cap (to the right) leads the pale figure of Christ, while Mary attempts to relieve her son of the weight of his cross, in this characteristically expressively delineated composition from the 'Peterborough Psalter', produced in the Norwich diocese, c.1304-21. Like other miniatures in this MS the scene is set within a beautifully decorated frame.
